data.text: @IpezerHaci @9NewsPerth The whole c0v is a lie. From the very beginning.

@9NewsPerth There are over 15,000 new cases everyday and there are no less than 100,000 active cases.
How do they know when people have Covid if they're testing at home ?
Which 90% of these tests are done at home and it doesn't get reported.
So this  4,500/day & 18,000 active is a lie ..!!!

@9NewsPerth Its not rocket science more testing = more cases ! It was inevitable WA has only been postponing what the rest of the world has been experiencing! The difference is we have moved on WA is still in 2019/20/21
@9NewsPerth Wow. Sort of exploded, didn't it.

@9NewsPerth Later or sooner this was gonna happen what was the point of closing borders most of the countries are dropping restrictions & perth is in March 2020 â€¦worlds most populated #India is just reporting 4000 cases after 2 yrs n planning to drop most restrictions

@styliting @9NewsPerth It's a knee jerk to yesterday's press questions (not sure if u saw it), but focused in on 0 in ICU. next day they claim 3, just very coincidental thats all! It helps drive fear (which there's still plenty of in WA) which helps justify keeping mandates! Context of ICU would help👍
@Totalbs19 @9NewsPerth Bro why would they have to state that? It's pretty obvious. Do you think across the entire state there's only 80 hospital patients?

@9NewsPerth kinda convenient given the grilling from the press yesterday re; ICU patients. Let's see the data WA Health? were they admitted to ICU because of covid? were they in the hospital because of Covid? Underlying conditions? Vax Status?
